title: Album Page, "Three Views of Gargoyles, Baden Baden", September 23, 1887
medium: Brush and watercolor, graphite on cream paperboard tipped into binding with fabric
inscribed: Recto, in graphite, from top right corner: (inscribed in circle) 53 / 65; side view; on a corner; Copper gargoyles / New Castle / Baden Baden / Sept 23rd 1887; front view.
description: Vertical sheet depicting two gargoyles: one is depicted from both the front and side, while the other below is only shown from the side. Each is mounted at a ninety-degree angle to an elaborate scrolling metal bracket.  The bracket and gargoyles have been tinted green, as if to imply a painted or patinated copper surface.

tombstone.epitaph:
Album Page, "Three Views of Gargoyles, Baden Baden", September 23, 1887.
September 23, 1887. Brush and watercolor, graphite on cream paperboard tipped into binding with fabric. Gift of Mrs. William Greenough. 1943-51-133.
